doc.title: Dushata - tova sam az
doc.plot: This film is about the painter Nikolay Maystorov - the exposed nerve of the modern Bulgarian painting. He is the painter of unfeigned sinfulness, the revealing frankness, and the terrifying loneliness. This film is about the artist who has taken the enormous task of painting on canvas the spiritual energy of the Gospel of Luke and the Gospel of John by the year 2006.
